articles.title: Xiaomi's market share in Europe surpasses Apple to rank 2nd in Q1 - Global Times - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: (May 6): Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi's market share in Europe has surpassed Apple in the first quarter, ranking the second in the smartphone market, according to Zeng Xuezhong, vice president of Xiaomi, Global Times reported.According to Zeng's post on We…
